tasks.instructions: You should spend about 20 minutes on this task
tasks.description: The chart gives information about the proportion of students choosing different science subjects in a university in 1992 and 2000

tasks.instructions: You should spend about 40 minutes on this task
tasks.topic: The increase in the production of consumer goods results in damage to the natural environment. What are the causes of this? What can be done to solve this problem?
requirements: Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience.
